title: Use Newton's Second Law
text: Use Newton's Second Law $$(F=ma)$$ to calculate the horizontal component of the force. Calculate the weight using $$W=m g$$ where $$g=\frac{9.81m}{s^2}$$ is the acceleration due to gravity. Then compare the force with the weight of the passenger.

title: Calculate the Ratio
text: Since the horizontal force $$F=49\times75$$, and weight $$W=75\times9.81$$, what is $$\frac{F}{W}$$? (round to the nearst integer)
